apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully depicts a couple with a woman of dark skin tone and a person of light skin tone, united by a vibrant red heart. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading makes the heart appear to float between them, radiating warmth and affection. The smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges of the figures convey a sense of harmony and loving connection, often used to symbolize romance or deep friendship in digital conversations.
